During  the  inspection,  PHMSA  observed  multiple  gaps  under  the  fence  at  the  Columbia 
Interchange valve site in  Northampton County, PA. Not all valves were locked, and the gaps under 
the  fence  provided  possible  access  to  individuals  desirous  of  conducting  vandalism  and 
unauthorized operation of valves at the site.
Therefore, Adelphia failed to follow its Valve Security Procedure as required per  § 192.605(a).
